import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); }; return (

Admin Dashboard

Welcome, {user?.email}

Manage Buses

Add, update, or delete bus information

Manage Routes

Define bus routes and destinations

Manage Schedules

Create and manage bus schedules

View All Bookings

View and manage all bookings

Manage Users

View and manage user accounts

Reports

Generate business reports

Search Buses

Search for buses as a customer

Booking History

View booking history

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
